Доставка по России осуществляется трансп: Delivery in Russia is carried out by transport companies. The price depends on the destination city, weight and dimensions of the cargo. The manager will tell you the approximate cost of delivery.
Сколько стоит подъём товара?: How much does it cost to lift goods?
Данную информацию вам может предоставить: This information can be provided to you by a TC employee or a manager of our company.
На что обратить внимание при приёме това: What should you pay attention to when receiving goods?
Обязательно следуйте инструкции по прием: Be sure to follow the instructions for receiving the cargo, which we send along with the contract. It describes in detail the scheme for receiving the cargo and what to do in case of dishonest delivery by the transport company.
В каких случаях можно вернуть или обменя: In what cases can I return or exchange a product?
В случае выявления повреждений упаковки: In case of detection of damage to the packaging and cargo upon delivery from the transport company, you have the right not to accept the cargo and refuse it. In other cases, if a manufacturing defect is detected, we will replace the parts at our own expense, if the conditions for acceptance and storage of the cargo before assembly were met.
Может ли принять мебель другой человек?: Can another person accept the furniture?
Да, если вы заранее предупредите об этом: Yes, if you notify our company manager in advance, or if circumstances change unexpectedly, contact the TC yourself with a request to change the recipient. Please note that when specifying a legal entity as a recipient, a power of attorney or other documents confirming the right to receive are required.
Есть ли сертификаты качества на мебель?: Are there quality certificates for the furniture? Can I see them?
Так как наши изделия не подлежат обязате: Since our products are not subject to mandatory certification, we cannot provide you with certificates for the products. But we do provide certificates for the materials from which our furniture is made.
Могу ли я отказаться от заказа при доста: Can I cancel my order upon delivery?
Вы можете отказаться от заказа по объект: You can refuse an order for objective reasons, which you purchased from stock. However, in this case you will be obliged to pay the shipping costs (delivery cost) to the sender.
Если же мебель изготавливалась под заказ: If the furniture was made to order, then it will not be possible to refuse it without objective reasons.

The name of such a table comes from the English word "briefing", which means a short (usually 15-30 minutes) discussion of specific issues. With the help of a briefing attachment to the table, it is easy to expand the space for business negotiations and improve the ergonomics of the room.
